LanguageData.ExtractRawSteelLeaf.label: smelt metal from Steel Shrooms
LanguageData.ExtractRawSteelLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Steel Shrooms. \n\nMakes 4 steel from 16 shrooms.
LanguageData.ExtractRawPlasteelLeaf.label: smelt metal from Plasteel Bulb Chunks
LanguageData.ExtractRawPlasteelLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Plasteel Bulb Chunks. \n\nMakes 4 Plasteel from 16 bulbs.
LanguageData.ExtractRawGoldLeaf.label: smelt metal from Gold Fern Leaves
LanguageData.ExtractRawGoldLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Gold Fern Leaves. \n\nMakes 4 Gold from 16 leaves.
LanguageData.ExtractRawSilverLeaf.label: smelt metal from Silver Flower Petals
LanguageData.ExtractRawSilverLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Silver Flower Petals. \n\nMakes 4 Silver from 16 petals.
LanguageData.ExtractRawUraniumLeaf.label: smelt metal from Uranium Root Bulbs
LanguageData.ExtractRawUraniumLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Uranium Root Bulbs. \n\nMakes 4 Uranium from 16 bulbs.
LanguageData.ExtractBulkSteelLeaf.label: bulk smelt metal from Steel Shrooms
LanguageData.ExtractBulkSteelLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Steel Shrooms. \n\nMakes 16 steel from 64 shrooms.
LanguageData.ExtractBulkPlasteelLeaf.label: bulk smelt metal from Plasteel Bulb Chunks
LanguageData.ExtractBulkPlasteelLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Plasteel Bulb Chunks. \n\nMakes 16 Plasteel from 64 bulds.
LanguageData.ExtractbulkGoldLeaf.label: bulk smelt metal from Gold Fern Leaves
LanguageData.ExtractbulkGoldLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Gold Fern Leaves. \n\nMakes 16 Gold from 64 leaves.
LanguageData.ExtractBulkSilverLeaf.label: bulk smelt metal from Silver Flower Petals
LanguageData.ExtractBulkSilverLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Silver Flower Petals. \n\nMakes 16 Silver from 64 petals.
LanguageData.ExtractBulkUraniumLeaf.label: bulk smelt metal from Uranium Root Bulbs
LanguageData.ExtractBulkUraniumLeaf.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from Uranium Root Bulbs. \n\nMakes 16 Uranium from 64 bulbs.
